resources.string:
BeHe ExploreR 
 - The intellectual browser - 
 THANK YOU EVERYONE! 
 This wouldn't be possible without you! 
 
 Thanks to all translators that helped! 
 Your translations rock! 
 
 Thanks to Pyotr! our Facebook page admin 
 
 Thanks to GitHub Platform! for hosting this project 
 
 Thanks to Crowdin Platform! for making translations possible 
 
 Thanks to the Lightning Browser project! for some useful code 
 
 Thanks to the TextDrawable library! 
 
 Thank you all who encouraged me to keep on going! 
 
 Vlad Todosin - BeHe ExploreR developer
